Package net.sf.jguiraffe.gui.layout

Class PercentLayoutPlatformAdapterImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jguiraffe.gui.layout.PercentLayoutPlatformAdapterImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, PercentLayoutPlatformAdapter, UnitSizeHandler
    public class PercentLayoutPlatformAdapterImpl
extends Object
implements PercentLayoutPlatformAdapter, UnitSizeHandler, Serializable
    A test implementation of PercentLayoutPlatformAdapter. This class uses simple objects as components that simulate UI controls. They only store coordinates.
    Version:
    $Id: PercentLayoutPlatformAdapterImpl.java 205 2012-01-29 18:29:57Z oheger $
    Author:
    Oliver Heger
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • createComponent

        public PercentLayoutPlatformAdapterImpl.Component createComponent​(String name,
                                                                  int wpref,
                                                                  int hpref,
                                                                  int wmin,
                                                                  int hmin,
                                                                  Object constr)
        Creates a component with the given sizes and adds it to this layout.
        Parameters:
        name - the optional name
        wpref - the preferred width
        hpref - the preferred height
        wmin - the minimum width
        hmin - the minimum height
        constr - the constraints
        Returns:
        the component

      • createComponent

        public PercentLayoutPlatformAdapterImpl.Component createComponent​(String name,
                                                                  int wpref,
                                                                  int hpref,
                                                                  Object constr)
        Creates a component with the given preferred size and adds it this layout. As minimum size the preferred size divided by 2 is used.
        Parameters:
        name - the optional name
        wpref - the preferred with
        hpref - the preferred height
        constr - the constraints
        Returns:
        the component

        Returns:
        the component with this name or null
